TableView.name: VIEW_SMP5_PAINEL_ACOMP
TableView.afterCreate:
CREATE OR REPLACE FORCE VIEW "EASYVIEW"."VIEW_SMP5_PAINEL_ACOMP" ("DATA", "PMM", "SMP5", "CN") AS
WITH Dias AS
(SELECT UNIQUE TO_CHAR(Dt.DATA, 'dd') AS Data
FROM CDRVIEW_SMP5 Dt
WHERE TO_CHAR(Dt.DATA, 'dd') >= 1
AND TO_CHAR(Dt.DATA, 'dd') <= 10
),
MesAno AS
(SELECT UNIQUE TO_CHAR(Dt.DATA, 'mm/yyyy') AS Data FROM CDRVIEW_SMP5 Dt
),
Dia_X_Mes_X_Ano AS
(SELECT Concat(Concat(Dias.Data, '/'), Mesano.Data) AS data
FROM Dias Dias,
Mesano Mesano
),
dados_traducao_sem_vinculo as
(select DATA, CENTRAL, CN, PMM, REGIONAL, SMP5_A, SMP5_B, SMP5_C, SMP5_D, UF from view_msc_vinculo_smp5 where codigo != 'NID'
),
Smps_dados AS
(SELECT Data AS DATA,
Pmm AS PMM,
TO_CHAR(CN) AS CN,
CASE
WHEN SMP5_B = '0'
AND SMP5_A != '-'
THEN '0,00'
WHEN SMP5_B = '-'
AND SMP5_A = '-'
THEN '-'
WHEN SMP5_B != '-'
AND SMP5_A = '-'
THEN '0,00'
WHEN SMP5_D = '0'
AND SMP5_C != '-'
THEN '0,00'
WHEN SMP5_D = '-'
AND SMP5_C = '-'
THEN '-'
WHEN SMP5_D != '-'
AND SMP5_C = '-'
THEN '0,00'
ELSE NVL(trim(TO_CHAR(ROUND(((SMP5_A / SMP5_B)*(SMP5_C / SMP5_D) * 100),2),'999990D99')), '-')
END AS SMP5
FROM
(SELECT TRUNC(Tab.DATA) AS Data,
pmm.NOME AS Pmm,
Tab.CN,
NVL(TO_CHAR(SUM(NVL(SMP5_A, 0))), '-') AS SMP5_A,
NVL(TO_CHAR(SUM(NVL(SMP5_B, 0))), '-') AS SMP5_B,
NVL(TO_CHAR(SUM(NVL(SMP5_C, 0))), '-') AS SMP5_C,
NVL(TO_CHAR(SUM(NVL(SMP5_D, 0))), '-') AS SMP5_D
FROM
view_msc_cn_ativo_smp5 b,
dados_traducao_sem_vinculo Tab
INNER JOIN PMM pmm
ON Tab.pmm = pmm.NOME
WHERE TO_CHAR(Tab.DATA, 'dd') IN
(SELECT Dias.Data FROM Dias
)
and tab.central = b.msc
and tab.cn = b.cn
and to_date(to_char(tab.data,'MM/yyyy'),'MM/yyyy') = b.periodo
and b.status = 'T'
GROUP BY TRUNC(Tab.DATA),
pmm.NOME,
Tab.CN
)
),
Dias_X_Cn_X_Pmm AS
(SELECT to_date(D.data, 'dd/mm/yyyy') AS Data,
Cn.nome,
Pmm.NOME AS Pmm
FROM CN Cn,
Dia_X_Mes_X_Ano D,
PMM Pmm
),
Dias_X_Cn_X_Pmm_X_Smp AS
(SELECT NVL(TRUNC(Smpdados.DATA), Diascnpmm.Data) AS Data,
Diascnpmm.Pmm,
NVL(TO_CHAR(Smpdados.SMP5), '-') AS SMP5,
Diascnpmm.nome AS Cn
FROM Dias_X_Cn_X_Pmm Diascnpmm,
Smps_Dados Smpdados
WHERE TRUNC(Diascnpmm.Data) = TRUNC(Smpdados.DATA(+))
AND Diascnpmm.Pmm = Smpdados.PMM(+)
AND Diascnpmm.nome = Smpdados.CN(+)
)
SELECT TO_CHAR(Dias_X_Cn_X_Pmm_X_Smp.Data, 'dd/MM/yyyy') data,
Dias_X_Cn_X_Pmm_X_Smp.Pmm,
CASE
WHEN Dias_X_Cn_X_Pmm_X_Smp.SMP5 != '-'
AND TO_NUMBER(Dias_X_Cn_X_Pmm_X_Smp.SMP5) > 100
THEN '100,00'
ELSE replace(Dias_X_Cn_X_Pmm_X_Smp.SMP5,'.',',')
END AS SMP5,
TO_CHAR(Dias_X_Cn_X_Pmm_X_Smp.Cn) AS CN
FROM Dias_X_Cn_X_Pmm_X_Smp
ORDER BY TO_CHAR(Dias_X_Cn_X_Pmm_X_Smp.Cn),
TO_CHAR(Dias_X_Cn_X_Pmm_X_Smp.Data, 'dd/MM/yyyy'),
Dias_X_Cn_X_Pmm_X_Smp.Pmm;
TableView.userDefinedSQL:
WITH Dias AS
(SELECT UNIQUE TO_CHAR(Dt.DATA, 'dd') AS Data
FROM CDRVIEW_SMP5 Dt
WHERE TO_CHAR(Dt.DATA, 'dd') >= 1
AND TO_CHAR(Dt.DATA, 'dd') <= 10
),
MesAno AS
(SELECT UNIQUE TO_CHAR(Dt.DATA, 'mm/yyyy') AS Data FROM CDRVIEW_SMP5 Dt
),
Dia_X_Mes_X_Ano AS
(SELECT Concat(Concat(Dias.Data, '/'), Mesano.Data) AS data
FROM Dias Dias,
Mesano Mesano
),
dados_traducao_sem_vinculo AS
(SELECT VIEW_MSC_VINCULO_SMP5.DATA,
VIEW_MSC_VINCULO_SMP5.CENTRAL,
VIEW_MSC_VINCULO_SMP5.CN,
VIEW_MSC_VINCULO_SMP5.PMM,
VIEW_MSC_VINCULO_SMP5.REGIONAL,
VIEW_MSC_VINCULO_SMP5.SMP5_A,
VIEW_MSC_VINCULO_SMP5.SMP5_B,
VIEW_MSC_VINCULO_SMP5.SMP5_C,
VIEW_MSC_VINCULO_SMP5.SMP5_D,
VIEW_MSC_VINCULO_SMP5.UF
FROM VIEW_MSC_VINCULO_SMP5
WHERE VIEW_MSC_VINCULO_SMP5.CODIGO != 'NID'
),
Smps_dados AS
(SELECT Data AS DATA,
Pmm AS PMM,
TO_CHAR(CN) AS CN,
CASE
WHEN SMP5_B = '0'
AND SMP5_A != '-'
THEN '0,00'
WHEN SMP5_B = '-'
AND SMP5_A = '-'
THEN '-'
WHEN SMP5_B != '-'
AND SMP5_A = '-'
THEN '0,00'
WHEN SMP5_D = '0'
AND SMP5_C != '-'
THEN '0,00'
WHEN SMP5_D = '-'
AND SMP5_C = '-'
THEN '-'
WHEN SMP5_D != '-'
AND SMP5_C = '-'
THEN '0,00'
ELSE NVL(trim(TO_CHAR(ROUND(((SMP5_A / SMP5_B) * (SMP5_C / SMP5_D) * 100), 2), '999990D99')), '-')
END AS SMP5
FROM
(SELECT TRUNC(Tab.DATA) AS Data,
pmm.NOME AS Pmm,
Tab.CN,
NVL(TO_CHAR(SUM(NVL(Tab.SMP5_A, 0))), '-') AS SMP5_A,
NVL(TO_CHAR(SUM(NVL(Tab.SMP5_B, 0))), '-') AS SMP5_B,
NVL(TO_CHAR(SUM(NVL(Tab.SMP5_C, 0))), '-') AS SMP5_C,
NVL(TO_CHAR(SUM(NVL(Tab.SMP5_D, 0))), '-') AS SMP5_D
FROM VIEW_MSC_CN_ATIVO_SMP5 b,
dados_traducao_sem_vinculo Tab
INNER JOIN PMM pmm
ON Tab.PMM = pmm.NOME
WHERE Tab.CENTRAL = b.MSC
AND Tab.CN = b.CN
AND to_date(TO_CHAR(Tab.DATA, 'MM/yyyy'), 'MM/yyyy') = b.PERIODO
AND TO_CHAR(Tab.DATA, 'dd') IN
(SELECT Dias.Data FROM Dias
)
AND b.STATUS = 'T'
GROUP BY TRUNC(Tab.DATA),
pmm.NOME,
Tab.CN
)
),
Dias_X_Cn_X_Pmm AS
(SELECT to_date(D.data, 'dd/mm/yyyy') AS Data,
Cn.nome,
Pmm.NOME AS Pmm
FROM CN Cn,
Dia_X_Mes_X_Ano D,
PMM Pmm
),
Dias_X_Cn_X_Pmm_X_Smp AS
(SELECT NVL(TRUNC(Smpdados.DATA), Diascnpmm.Data) AS Data,
Diascnpmm.Pmm,
NVL(TO_CHAR(Smpdados.SMP5), '-') AS SMP5,
Diascnpmm.nome AS Cn
FROM Dias_X_Cn_X_Pmm Diascnpmm,
Smps_Dados Smpdados
WHERE TRUNC(Diascnpmm.Data) = TRUNC(Smpdados.DATA(+))
AND Diascnpmm.Pmm = Smpdados.PMM(+)
AND Diascnpmm.nome = Smpdados.CN(+)
)
SELECT TO_CHAR(Dias_X_Cn_X_Pmm_X_Smp.Data, 'dd/MM/yyyy') data,
Dias_X_Cn_X_Pmm_X_Smp.Pmm,
CASE
WHEN Dias_X_Cn_X_Pmm_X_Smp.SMP5 != '-'
AND TO_NUMBER(Dias_X_Cn_X_Pmm_X_Smp.SMP5) > 100
THEN '100,00'
ELSE REPLACE(Dias_X_Cn_X_Pmm_X_Smp.SMP5, '.', ',')
END AS SMP5,
TO_CHAR(Dias_X_Cn_X_Pmm_X_Smp.Cn) AS CN
FROM Dias_X_Cn_X_Pmm_X_Smp
ORDER BY CN,
data,
Dias_X_Cn_X_Pmm_X_Smp.Pmm
TableView.layoutSQL: With Dias As (Select Unique TO_CHAR(Dt.DATA, 'dd') As Data From CDRVIEW_SMP5 Dt Where TO_CHAR(Dt.DATA, 'dd') >= 1 And TO_CHAR(Dt.DATA, 'dd') <= 10), MesAno As (Select Unique TO_CHAR(Dt.DATA, 'mm/yyyy') As Data From CDRVIEW_SMP5 Dt), Dia_X_Mes_X_Ano As (Select Concat(Concat(Dias.Data, '/'), Mesano.Data) As data From Dias Dias, Mesano Mesano), dados_traducao_sem_vinculo As (Select VIEW_MSC_VINCULO_SMP5.DATA, VIEW_MSC_VINCULO_SMP5.CENTRAL, VIEW_MSC_VINCULO_SMP5.CN, VIEW_MSC_VINCULO_SMP5.PMM, VIEW_MSC_VINCULO_SMP5.REGIONAL, VIEW_MSC_VINCULO_SMP5.SMP5_A, VIEW_MSC_VINCULO_SMP5.SMP5_B, VIEW_MSC_VINCULO_SMP5.SMP5_C, VIEW_MSC_VINCULO_SMP5.SMP5_D, VIEW_MSC_VINCULO_SMP5.UF From VIEW_MSC_VINCULO_SMP5 Where VIEW_MSC_VINCULO_SMP5.CODIGO != 'NID'), Smps_dados As (Select Data As DATA, Pmm As PMM, TO_CHAR(CN) As CN, Case When SMP5_B = '0' And SMP5_A != '-' Then '0,00' When SMP5_B = '-' And SMP5_A = '-' Then '-' When SMP5_B != '-' And SMP5_A = '-' Then '0,00' When SMP5_D = '0' And SMP5_C != '-' Then '0,00' When SMP5_D = '-' And SMP5_C = '-' Then '-' When SMP5_D != '-' And SMP5_C = '-' Then '0,00' Else NVL(trim(TO_CHAR(ROUND(((SMP5_A / SMP5_B) * (SMP5_C / SMP5_D) * 100), 2), '999990D99')), '-') End As SMP5 From (Select TRUNC(Tab.DATA) As Data, pmm.NOME As Pmm, Tab.CN, NVL(TO_CHAR(Sum(NVL(Tab.SMP5_A, 0))), '-') As SMP5_A, NVL(TO_CHAR(Sum(NVL(Tab.SMP5_B, 0))), '-') As SMP5_B, NVL(TO_CHAR(Sum(NVL(Tab.SMP5_C, 0))), '-') As SMP5_C, NVL(TO_CHAR(Sum(NVL(Tab.SMP5_D, 0))), '-') As SMP5_D From VIEW_MSC_CN_ATIVO_SMP5 b, dados_traducao_sem_vinculo Tab Inner Join PMM pmm On Tab.PMM = pmm.NOME Where Tab.CENTRAL = b.MSC And Tab.CN = b.CN And to_date(to_char(Tab.DATA, 'MM/yyyy'), 'MM/yyyy') = b.PERIODO And TO_CHAR(Tab.DATA, 'dd') In (Select Dias.Data From Dias) And b.STATUS = 'T' Group By TRUNC(Tab.DATA), pmm.NOME, Tab.CN)), Dias_X_Cn_X_Pmm As (Select to_date(D.data, 'dd/mm/yyyy') As Data, Cn.nome, Pmm.NOME As Pmm From CN Cn, Dia_X_Mes_X_Ano D, PMM Pmm), Dias_X_Cn_X_Pmm_X_Smp As (Select NVL(TRUNC(Smpdados.DATA), Diascnpmm.Data) As Data, Diascnpmm.Pmm, NVL(TO_CHAR(Smpdados.SMP5), '-') As SMP5, Diascnpmm.nome As Cn From Dias_X_Cn_X_Pmm Diascnpmm, Smps_Dados Smpdados Where TRUNC(Diascnpmm.Data) = TRUNC(Smpdados.DATA(+)) And Diascnpmm.Pmm = Smpdados.PMM(+) And Diascnpmm.nome = Smpdados.CN(+)) Select TO_CHAR(Dias_X_Cn_X_Pmm_X_Smp.Data, 'dd/MM/yyyy') data, Dias_X_Cn_X_Pmm_X_Smp.Pmm, Case When Dias_X_Cn_X_Pmm_X_Smp.SMP5 != '-' And TO_NUMBER(Dias_X_Cn_X_Pmm_X_Smp.SMP5) > 100 Then '100,00' Else replace(Dias_X_Cn_X_Pmm_X_Smp.SMP5, '.', ',') End As SMP5, TO_CHAR(Dias_X_Cn_X_Pmm_X_Smp.Cn) As CN From Dias_X_Cn_X_Pmm_X_Smp Order By CN, data, Dias_X_Cn_X_Pmm_X_Smp.Pmm

viewElement.name: SMP5
viewElement.expression: Case When Dias_X_Cn_X_Pmm_X_Smp.SMP5 != '-' And TO_NUMBER(Dias_X_Cn_X_Pmm_X_Smp.SMP5) > 100 Then '100,00' Else replace(Dias_X_Cn_X_Pmm_X_Smp.SMP5, '.', ',') End
